Product Description

Easy to Install and Use

Just connect the product and insert this firefly light in your garden to add atmosphere to your yard

Add a sense of warmth and ambiance to your garden at night

When relaxing in the courtyard at night, firefly lights solar outdoor can not only create a warm light but also listen to the crisp sound of crashing

Solar firefly lights outdoor waterproof

The waterproof rating of solar garden light is IP65, this firefly lights can stand in any rain and snow, and work perfectly in bad weather

Perfect garden decorations: Solar powered outdoor lights can be used for outdoor decoration for the patio, yard, lawn, and walkway. As well as Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day, Anniversary, Birthday, Halloween, Christmas, Wedding, New Years, Parties and other occasions, creating a romantic and festive atmosphere.Firefly lights add sparkle to your yard
No need electricity charge: Solar firefly light powered the solar panel, no manual charging needed and without any electricity bill.Solar panels can be charged with 6-8 hours during the day, and can work for 8-12 hours when night falls
Easy to use: Just grow solar firefly lights in your garden, before use the switch needs to be adjusted to “ON”, to ensure the normal operation of the firefly light, the solar garden starburst swaying lights will surprise you in the evening
Solar firefly lights outdoor waterproof: The waterproof rating of solar garden light is IP65, this firefly lights can stand in any rain and snow, and work perfectly in bad weather

From the brand

With more than 6 years experience in designing and manufacturing toys,CENOVE was founded in 2017.With over 1 million customers in more than 100 countries and regions around the world.We are a young team full of passion & dreams.We are committed to toy. Wish all of the children have a happy childhood.

Safety Toddler Toy:CENOVE pretend flower garden toy set is made with Eco-friendly materials. BPA-Free,Non-toxic, No smell.Smooth surface,won’t hurt kids’ hands.Meet with ASTM F963-16/-17 and CPSIA safety standards.
Easy to Clean & Organizer: Comes with a nice green carry box to organizer. All parts could be washed with water. It also could be washed in a dish washer.
Educational Tool: Learning about the parts of a plant. Bright, colorful STEM garden toys help hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.
Cool Toys Gifts for 3 4 5 6 7 Years Old Girls and Boys:Best gifts for birthday,Children’s Day,Christmas,Easter,Summer camp activities.
Creative Development:This build a bouquet craft kits allow young children to build, match and sort. They can mix and match pieces to create different flowers at will.Flower Set provides children with realistic early STEM support skills

CENOVE Build a Bouquet Floral Arrangement Playset

  • It develop the sense of beauty and creativity. Plus it’s just fun to put these flowers, stems, leaves and bases together. It is a simple but fun toy.

  • The lilies, daisies, morning glory, plum blossom, orchid, hibiscus and murraya paniculata easy-to-stack in the assorted stems for limitless fun that blossoms in all seasons. It is not only building toys for kids ages 3-6, but also it can be used for room decoration.

Safty and Durable

  • BPA-free & without coating. All parts are made of high-quality, harmless and non-toxic PP plastic.

Toddler Learning Toys

  • Help pre-school children learning about the parts of a plant.
  • With a variety of petals and leaves, children can create different flower combinations. They can play for hours without getting bored. Perfect gifts for kids.

Cute Garden Toy

  • It is not only a fun toy for indoors, but the children can also play with the flower toy in the garden. It helps to improve the eye-hand coordination of the children and cultivate the flower knowledge.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Outdoor Faucet Covers for Winter, 2 PCS 6″Wx 9″H Reusable Outside Faucet Insulated Cover Socks, Freeze Protection Garden Hose Cover Socks for Wall Taps Outside
【High Compatibility】 Faucet cover measures 9in x 6in, 2.3 inch thick. It is about 1-2 inch larger and 1inch thicker than most of other faucet socks. Works well with various faucet types, such as garden spigots, hose bibs, water tap, keep faucets protected in freezing weather.
【Quick & Easy Installtion 】 The faucet socks with Velcro straps are easy to put on and take off even you wear gloves in cold winter. Simply pull the cover over the faucet/tap and fasten it tightly with the Velcro strap. A few seconds is all it takes!
【Superior Protection】 Very thick faucet cover design. In winter protecting your outside faucets from freezing and bursting. In summer prevent faucets from the blazing sun or the rust. Help save costly repairs. It has the functions of antifreeze, rainproof, snowproof, sun exposure, windproof and dust prevention.
【Super Waterproof & Insulation】The water faucet cover for winter is constructed of 3 layers – 210D oxford cloth waterproof coating thicker insulated silk cotton 190t taffeta waterproof coating, making it durable and reusable season after season. effectively keep the faucet dry and warm during.
【Please Confirm Again】You will receive 2 pack faucet protective covers. Please measure the size before purchase,If you don’t know the size of your faucet, you can try to buy. It works well with various faucet types. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. We will reply within 24 hours.

(as of Nov 30,2022 07:49:38 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Founded in 2015, Sealegend is focused on helping people reduce cleaning burdens, reduce safety hazards and improve the happiness.

Sealegend’s mission is to provide quality and cost-effective products, spread home cleaning concepts and a healthy lifestyle.

We have been working on dryer vent cleaning products and our products have reached a good use function. In order to meet different customer needs, we have also developed more different styles.

Why was the brand sealegend born?

As we all know, the dryers are a must-have electrical appliance in every household, but the long-term lack of cleaning of dryers is also the main cause of annual fires. Therefore, in order to solve the confusion and safety problems of daily cleaning, we began to develop convenient and efficient cleaning kit for dryers, and the Sealegend brand was born.

What makes our products different?

Every Sealegend product is carefully developed by our R&D department. Through a lot of market research, we continue to come up with ideas to solve customer problems, so as to produce suitable products.

What problem are we solving?

Save money and provide effective cleaning tools. Helps solve lots of difficult-to-clean problems.

Dryer vent cleaner kit

Vent Cleaner Kit Lint Remover

Dryer Vacuum Attachment

[New design]-Essential for Dryer Vent-Our long attachment hose attaches to your vacuum and lets you clean the deep recesses of your appliances. Perfect for your washing machine, dryer, freeze dryer machine, and more can run more efficiently. Flexible and handy hose is perfect for removing lint build-up beyond you can’t reach
[Improve Dryer Performance] The dryer that cannot be cleaned for many years accumulates a lot of dirt. The vents will become narrow or even blocked. Our dryer lint vacuum attachment can clean the vents effectively and make your equipment runs more efficiently
[Helps Prevent Fires] The dust lint is the main cause of fire in the dryer. Every year there are tens of thousands of fires caused by the failure of the dryer. So we need this dryer vent cleaner kit to keep cleaning of the dryer and prevent fires
[A Cost-Effective Cleaning Kit] Dryer Lint Cleaner kit adds years to your appliances. You will have saved more money in cleaning and maintenance costs. Not only that, but you are helping them avoid lint fires. Keep them safe and protect the performance of dryer. It is valuable for you to choose this dryer vent vacuum hose
[2 Types of Hoses can be Switched for Use] In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses. When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection to connect to the corresponding long hose.

***In order to adapt to different dryer vents, we provide two types of hoses.

***When switching use, you only need to remove the adapter and the hose connection and then connect to the corresponding long hose.

1. What do you get ?

One round hose with guide wire, one flat hose, and one adpater.

Paid one and you can get more kinds of way to clean your dryer easy and effectively

2. What can this Dryer Vent Vacuum Cleaner Attachment help you?

(1)This dryer vent cleaner can attached to your vacuum and reach to fit into the narrow crevice of your machine. Don’t worry about the corner you can’t clean.

(2)This attachment is a time and money saver! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(3)Before this, cleaning the dryer maybe a nightmare. And you always ingnore to clean the dryer vent. Now this attachment is a time and money saver for you ! It makes dryer cleaning extremely fast and easy.

(4)If there something wrong with my filter vent in my dryer, You don’t need to buy a new filter vent and firstly just use the dryer vent Cleaner Kit to clean vent and get away from the a mess lint in bottom of filter.

Multiple Using Features

If you need to switch, you need to remove the part 2 and all flat hose, and then connect the Version 2

Warranty & Support

Price: $15.99 - $11.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:05:56 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Great For Garden Use

For gardeners, plants and vegetables are very important to them.

Especially during bad weather with strong wind and snow, you should need garden fabric (such as row cover or plant cover, or shade cloth), but the good garden clips are also a necessary part of your garden, they can fix the garden fabric in place to extend the growing season.

Beside garden clips, they also can be great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, beach towel clips, etc.

We are sure they will become ideal accessories for you.

About Samhopo

Samhopo means “hopes”, which is also the name of a remote village.

The founder is coming from this very poor and backward place. She is eager to do something to help the people get out of there and have a better life, so there is “Samhopo”

The purpose of the brand is to sell affordable products all around the world to help people live more conveniently.

Large Open Heavy Duty Greenhouse Clips

Feature

Material: stainless steel（Note: the spring part is not stainless steel.）

Length:approx. 2 inch

Width: approx. 1.1 inch

Single clip weight: approx. 0.2 ounce

Package includes:40 x Greenhouse Clips

Have a strong grip Good spring action Sturdy and durable. Smooth edges Easy to Use

MULTI-USE Garden Clips

They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use

Suitable for many hoops of different thickness.

Diameter in closed state approx 3/8”

GOOD SPRING ACTION: Samhopo garden clips has a thick spring, which has good spring action and can be adapted to most different sizes of garden hoops, stands, pipe or poles. Easy to open and strong. These greenhouse clamps have a strong grip and will not disintegrate like plastic.
MULTI-USE PRODUCT: These greenhouse clips are strong enough to hold down the netting on your raised garden beds or row cover on your garden hoops when it’s a windy day. They will be helpful to anyone who wants them for garden use. Aside from garden use, they make great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, cord clips for hanging up string lights, etc.
SUITABLE FOR MANY HOOPS OF DIFFERENT THICKNESSES: These garden clips have good spring action and strong grip, Diameter in closed state approx 0.36 inches, Maximum diameter in open state approx 0.8 inches, Can be adapted to many different sizes of greenhouse hoops, poles, pipe or stands.
DURABLE MATERIAL: These greenhouse clamps are made of stainless steel(Note: The spring part is not stainless steel), sturdy and durable. They are more durable than wood clips or plastic clips. The clips snapped on easily and held the frost blankets and greenhouse cover in place through high winds and heavy snow.
PACKAGE INCLUDES: 40pcs stainless steel greenhouse clips. Size of the clamp: Length approx. 2 inches, Width approx. 1.1 inches, Single clip weight 0.2 ounce. Please be concerned about the size before you buy.

Great For Garden Use

For gardeners, plants and vegetables are very important to them.

Especially during bad weather with strong wind and snow, you should need garden fabric (such as row cover or plant cover, or shade cloth), but the good garden clips are also a necessary part of your garden, they can fix the garden fabric in place to extend the growing season.

Beside garden clips, they also can be great food bag closure clips, clothespins, binder clips, photo clips, beach towel clips, etc.

We are sure they will become ideal accessories for you.

About Samhopo

Samhopo means “hopes”, which is also the name of a remote village.

The founder is coming from this very poor and backward place. She is eager to do something to help the people get out of there and have a better life, so there is “Samhopo”

The purpose of the brand is to sell affordable products all around the world to help people live more conveniently.

Professional Blackhead Tools

How did we get our start?

JPNK is a founded in 2015. We are committed to providing safe and professional facial cleaning kits for women who love beauty all over the world.

What makes our products unique?

Our acne needle set is made of 304 stainless steel. We also opened a cosmetics tool product line, so that more customers can buy better products with less money.We always take product safety and product experience as the first standard, we design products based on customers’ needs.

From the brand

Vtopmart is dedicated to creating a better home life for every family.

Our Vision:

To pursue a better life and enjoy it, we are committed to providing various well-designed, high-quality, practically household products with fashionable concepts and innovative design to make your home full of warmth and love.

Vtopmart Drawer Organizer

Explore More Categories

Fit Multi Occasions

Make Everything Organized —- These clear versatile drawer dividers trays are perfect for any place in your home. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity / bathroom / kitchen / office drawers, ideal for organizing cosmetics, makeup tools, hair accessories, jewelry, office supplies, craft supplies, utensils, etc.
Combination of 4 Different Sizes —- One set includes 25pcs storage bins in 4 different sizes, which makes you can customize combinations to store items and organize drawer for your specific needs. Includes: 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs), 9 x 3x 2 inches(6pcs), 6 x 3 x 2 inches(8pcs), 3 x 3 x 2 inches(8cps).
Non-Slip and Durable —- Extra 200pcs silicone pads are included, just stick them on the bottom of the plastic trays for non-slip. Made of durable and clear plastic, so you can see what’s in it without digging around or making a mess, help you get a neat lifestyle.
Stackable Design —- Organize all your items and then stack these bins into one other, that will save much space especially when you have a narrow drawer. Use these trays to separate your messy drawer, you will find it’s so easy to keep things neat and tidy.
Easy to Clean —- Our desk drawer storage bins are easy to be wiped clean with a damp cloth and perfect for keeping everything in its place. Convenient for use in your daily life, make everything look beautiful and better organized.

Read more

4 Size Combination

Variety of sizes help make the organization of different items more flexible and easier. Fit all kinds of drawers, such as vanity, bathroom, kitchen and office drawers

Non-Slip Design

Silicone pads at the bottom of the bin prevent the box from moving when dragging the drawer, always keep things in their own place.

Built to Last

Made of durable and transparent plastic, built to last. Clear bins make you can see everything in them when pulling a stack of them out of a drawer.

Package Include:

  • 9 x 6 x 2 inches (3pcs)
  • 9 x 3x 2 inches (6pcs)
  • 6 x 3 x 2 inches (8pcs)
  • 3 x 3 x 2 inches (8cps)

Organize Makeup

Organize Office Supplies

Convenient for storing small items such as pencils, stationery and so on, helping you to save space. Make your desk look more neatly and cleanly.

Organize Kitchen Utensils

Ideal for organizing forks, spoons, steak knives in your kitchen, allow you to keep everything handy for meal prep and cooking.
